Node.Text: Thomas gave me a bouquet of flowers this morning. Isn't he so sweet?
You talk about Thomas very often...
Yeah, I guess so. Why does that matter?
Yeah, well, he reminds me of someone. I don't think he has many people to support him, that's why he's here by himself.
Who does he remind you of?
Just... someone from far away. It was a long time ago, so it doesn't matter anymore.
You have a slight accent. Where is it from?
Oh no, is it that noticeable? I'm just teasing! I'm actually from Algeria, and French is my first language. I only speak English here, though.
It's very far for you to be studying here. It must be difficult.
Sometimes it is. My parents wanted the best for me, and there weren't many opportunities back home. Here, I'm following my dreams!
And, to be completely honest, I like it better here, too. There are some things at home that I don't want to face again.
Have a good evening, sir! I'll see you later!
Thank you, have a good evening.
